src_original: aṣṭaśatābhimantritaṃ nīlaśāṭake granthiṃ kuryāt /  mallasya jayo bhavati /  ekaviṃśatijaptaṃ bhasmaṃ mallasya śiraśi dāpayet /
śuklapratipadamārabhya paṭasyāgrataḥ ghṛtakṣīrasahitāṃ tāmrabhājane sthāpya aṣṭaśatajaptpaṃ kṛtvā pibed divasāni sapta /
sadhātukaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ūrdhvaṃ gacchati /  vidyādharo bhavati /
